int port
Port to use to connect to the RabbitMQ broker.

requestedHeartbeat

int requestedHeartbeat
Sets the requested heartbeat delay, in seconds, that the server sends in the connection.tune frame. 5 is the RabbitMQ default. 0 means unlimited.

ssl

boolean ssl
Whether the connection uses SSL.

threads

int threads
Number of concurrent threads (0 is unlimited).
